SELECT ttm.* FROM t_supplier_project_participant spp INNER JOIN t_tender_message ttm on ttm.bids_id =spp.bids_id where 1=1 and spp.user_id= #{id} and spp.is_deleted=0 and ttm.is_deleted=0
